question: Not a synthetic pyrethroid insectiside -
exp: Ans. is 'a' i. e., Propoxuro Inectisides are divided into:-A) Fumigants: Hydrogen cyanide, SO2, methyl bromide, carbon disulphate. B) Stomach poisons: Paris green, Sodium fluoride. C) Contact (nerve) poisons: These are divided into -1) Natural: Pyrethrum, rotenone, Derris, nicotine, mineral oil. 2) Synthetic: These are -i) Organophosphates: Malathion, parathion, fenthion, diazinon, fenitrothion, abate, chlorthion, dioxathion, chlorpyrifos, trichlorfon. ii) Carbamates: Carbaryl, propoxur, dimetilan, pyrolon. iii) Organochlorine: DDT, BHC (HCH), dieldrin, aldrin, chlordane, lindane, heptachlor. iv) Synthetic pyrethroid (pyrethrum derivatives): Pothrin, resmethrin, permethrin, biopermethrin, cypermethrin, cyphenothrin, cycloprothrin, deltamethrin, cyfluthrin, etofenoprox.
